## R Markdown
Are comments used effectively?
Are there too many/too few comments?
Do variable names communicate what the variable is storing?
Is the code easy to read?
Is the code easy to understand?
Are there code blocks that can be simplified or removed?
If there are dependencies, are they justified?
Can the code be executed without error?
Does the code exhibit the expected behavior when executed?
